pages.text: Created using an $(blood)Alchemy Array$() by combining a $(l:animus:items/reagenttemporaldominance)Reagent: Temporal Dominance$() with a $(item)Demon Slate$(). The reagent must first be forged in the Hellfire Forge.

The Sigil of Temporal Dominance grants mastery over time itself, allowing you to accelerate the tick rate of block entities using LP. With each activation, the temporal field intensifies, compounding the acceleration up to incredible speeds.

Sneak + right-click on a block entity to activate temporal acceleration. Each activation increases the speed level and refreshes the 30-second timer.$(br2)The sigil progressively accelerates time, with each level doubling the tick rate.

pages.title: Progression System
pages.text: The sigil operates on a 5-level progression:$(br)• Level 1: 2x speed, 1,000 LP$(br)• Level 2: 4x speed, 2,000 LP$(br)• Level 3: 8x speed, 4,000 LP$(br)• Level 4: 16x speed, 8,000 LP$(br)• Level 5: 32x speed, 16,000 LP$(br2)At maximum level, you can refresh the timer for 15,000 LP. When the timer expires, all progress resets.

pages.title: Compatibility
pages.text: The Sigil of Temporal Dominance respects other time acceleration methods and will not stack with:$(br)• GAG's Temporal Pouch$(br)• Time in a Bottle$(br)• JustDireThings' Time Wand$(br2)This prevents temporal instabilities and ensures balanced gameplay when used alongside other mods.

pages.title: Restrictions
pages.text: Certain blocks cannot be accelerated for balance or technical reasons. By default, the Master Ritual Stone is protected from acceleration.$(br2)Modpack authors can add additional blocks to the $(l)animus:disallow_acceleration$() block tag to prevent acceleration of specific blocks.

pages.title: Usage Tips
pages.text: The sigil works on any block entity with a tick function; furnaces, machines, plants, rituals, and more.$(br2)Strategic use involves:$(br)• Building up to max level for best efficiency$(br)• Refreshing just before expiration$(br)• Positioning multiple accelerated blocks nearby$(br2)At max level with regular refreshes, you achieve 32x speed for 15,000 LP per 30 seconds; a powerful acceleration tool!
